HOOOOOTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!
I made this animation a few months before I ended up getting hired :D

Are you seriously telling me that one day someone at Riot saw a gif of a Poro shaking it's money maker on the internet. They then turned to their subordinate, and said "We need that man". That would actually explain a few things.

I'd hire him in a second. 

Also, the possessive form is "its". Grammar police wee woo wee woo.
"He's the hero League deserves, the one it needs right now. So we'll hire him. Because he can do it." - Riot HQ.
